home.title: Track your Dubai property value growth — anytime, anywhere
home.subtitle: Estimate first · Decide better
home.sizeTip: Tip: you can clear the field and type again.

error.noData: We don’t have enough market data to produce a reliable estimate for this selection yet. Please try another area or community.

home.disclaimer: Independent market-based estimate · No listings · No agents

result.title: Estimated market value
result.subtitle: Estimate first. Decide better.

how.title: How this estimate is calculated
how.desc: This estimate is generated using community-level pricing ranges and size adjustment.
how.areaMatch: This estimate is based on recent transactions in the same area.
how.footer: This is a market-based estimate, not a formal appraisal. Final value may vary depending on building, floor, view, condition and timing.
how.extra: When community-level ranges are available, we prioritize them; otherwise we fall back to area-level ranges.

trend.title: Price trend (90 days)
trend.note: Note: trend is an estimated signal for the selected inputs.

rent.title: Rent estimate (informational)
rent.basis: Basis: a broad gross yield band for quick screening.

result.adjustmentsTitle: What could move your value up or down

seaView.label: Sea / Marina view
seaView.note: Strong premium for unobstructed water views

highFloor.label: High floor
highFloor.note: Higher floors typically trade at a premium

view.title: View premium
view.desc: Sea/Marina/Open views can materially lift value.

floor.title: Floor level
floor.desc: Higher floors often trade at a premium in towers.

condition.title: Condition
condition.desc: Renovation and maintenance are major swing factors.

parking.title: Parking & extras
parking.desc: Parking, storage, balcony can add value.

snapshot.title: Market snapshot (estimated)
snapshot.note: Snapshot is derived from the estimate + lightweight heuristics. We’ll replace with real stats once data is integrated.

share.title: Share this estimate
share.tip: Tip: Share to a friend on WhatsApp to compare prices in the same community.

result.disclaimer: Estimates, sample comps, and market snapshot are informational and may differ from actual market prices. Not a formal appraisal.

refine.title: Improve valuation accuracy
refine.helper: Fill what you know (30 seconds). More details → tighter range.
refine.note: We use this to refine your estimate and improve our model.

messages.notEnoughData: Not enough data to refine yet. Please try another area.
messages.thanks: Thanks! We used your details to tighten the range.

help.title: Something looks off? Talk to us
help.desc: We respect your privacy. No estimate or property details are shared unless you choose to.
